biography: Mikko, a formidable presence on the greens, hails from the esteemed Kurk Golf club. Known for his steely gaze and unwavering focus, Mikko is a golfer who commands respect both on and off the course.

With one past appearance at the Hector Trophée, Mikko is no stranger to the pressures of this prestigious tournament. While the Hector Trophée and the Victor Trophy have eluded him thus far, his determination suggests that it is only a matter of time before he hoists one of them above his head in triumph.
Although Mikko will not be participating in the upcoming Hector Trophée 2025, his fans are hoping that he will be back for future events to showcase his exceptional talent and competitive spirit.
